#include<bits/stdc++.h>

using namespace std;

int main()
{
	int t,n,m,s,p,q,loop,posp,posq,i,cnt;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--)
	{
		cin>>n>>m>>s>>p>>q;
		loop=n-m+1;
		posp=posq=1;
		cnt=0;
		for(i=0;i<s;i++)
		{
			posp = (posp + p);
			//cout<<posp<<"\n";
			if(posp>m)
			{
				posp=m+(posp-m)%loop;
			}
			//cout<<posp<<"\n";
			/*if(posp==posq)
			cnt++;*/
			posq = (posq + q);
			if(posq>m)
			{
				posq=m+(posq-m)%loop;
			}
			if(posp==posq)
			cnt++;
			//cout<<posp<<" "<<posq<<"\n";
		}
		cout<<cnt<<"\n";
	}
	return 0;
}
